mapper.update: update c_goods set goodsid=goodsid ,goodstypeid=#{goodstypeid} ,goodscode=#{goodscode} ,goodsname=#{goodsname} ,goodsspec=#{goodsspec} ,measunit=#{measunit} ,barcode=#{barcode} ,description=#{description} ,remark=#{remark} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,updateuserid=#{updateuserid} ,updatetime=#{updatetime} ,sequno=#{sequno} where goodsid=#{goodsid}

update c_goods set goodsid=goodsid ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,goodstypeid=#{goodstypeid} ,goodscode=#{goodscode} ,goodsname=#{goodsname} ,goodsspec=#{goodsspec} ,measunit=#{measunit} ,barcode=#{barcode} ,description=#{description} ,remark=#{remark} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,updateuserid=#{updateuserid} ,updatetime=#{updatetime} ,sequno=#{sequno} where 1=1 and goodsid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and goodsid =#{Where_Id} and goodsid=#{Where_goodsid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and goodstypeid=#{Where_goodstypeid} and goodscode=#{Where_goodscode} and goodsname=#{Where_goodsname} and goodsspec=#{Where_goodsspec} and measunit=#{Where_measunit} and barcode=#{Where_barcode} and description=#{Where_description} and remark=#{Where_remark} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and updateuserid=#{Where_updateuserid} and updatetime=#{Where_updatetime} and sequno=#{Where_sequno}
mapper.select: select t.goodsid "goodsid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.goodstypeid "goodstypeid", t.goodscode "goodscode", t.goodsname "goodsname", t.goodsspec "goodsspec", t.measunit "measunit", t.barcode "barcode", t.description "description", t.remark "remark", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.updateuserid "updateuserid", t.updatetime "updatetime", t.sequno "sequno", lc.companyname companyname, lg.graindepotname graindepotname, cg.goodstypename goodstypename from c_goods t left join l_company lc on lc.companyid = t.companyid left join l_graindepot lg on lg.graindepotid = t.graindepotid left join c_goodstype cg on cg.goodstypeid = t.goodstypeid where goodsid=#{goodsid}

select t.goodsid "goodsid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.goodstypeid "goodstypeid", t.goodscode "goodscode", t.goodsname "goodsname", t.goodsspec "goodsspec", t.measunit "measunit", t.barcode "barcode", t.description "description", t.remark "remark", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.updateuserid "updateuserid", t.updatetime "updatetime", t.sequno "sequno" from c_goods t where 1=1 and t.goodsid=#{goodsid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.goodstypeid=#{goodstypeid} and t.goodscode=#{goodscode} and t.goodsname=#{goodsname} and t.goodsspec=#{goodsspec} and t.measunit=#{measunit} and t.barcode=#{barcode} and t.description=#{description} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.updateuserid=#{updateuserid} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime} and t.sequno=#{sequno}

select t.goodsid "goodsid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.goodstypeid "goodstypeid", t.goodscode "goodscode", t.goodsname "goodsname", t.goodsspec "goodsspec", t.measunit "measunit", t.barcode "barcode", t.description "description", t.remark "remark", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.updateuserid "updateuserid", t.updatetime "updatetime", t.sequno "sequno" from c_goods t where 1=1 and t.goodsid=#{goodsid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.goodstypeid=#{goodstypeid} and t.goodscode=#{goodscode} and t.goodsname=#{goodsname} and t.goodsspec=#{goodsspec} and t.measunit=#{measunit} and t.barcode=#{barcode} and t.description=#{description} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.updateuserid=#{updateuserid} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime} and t.sequno=#{sequno}
mapper.delete: delete from c_goods where 1=1 and goodsid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and goodsid =#{Where_Id} and goodsid=#{Where_goodsid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and goodstypeid=#{Where_goodstypeid} and goodscode=#{Where_goodscode} and goodsname=#{Where_goodsname} and goodsspec=#{Where_goodsspec} and measunit=#{Where_measunit} and barcode=#{Where_barcode} and description=#{Where_description} and remark=#{Where_remark} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and updateuserid=#{Where_updateuserid} and updatetime=#{Where_updatetime} and sequno=#{Where_sequno}
mapper.select: select t.goodsid "goodsid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.goodstypeid "goodstypeid", t.goodscode "goodscode", t.goodsname "goodsname", t.goodsspec "goodsspec", t.measunit "measunit", t.barcode "barcode", t.description "description", t.remark "remark", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.updateuserid "updateuserid", t.updatetime "updatetime", t.sequno "sequno", cg.goodstypename goodstypename from c_goods t left join c_goodstype cg on cg.goodstypeid = t.goodstypeid where 1=1 and t.goodsid=#{goodsid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.goodstypeid=#{goodstypeid} and t.goodscode=#{goodscode} and t.goodsspec=#{goodsspec} and t.measunit=#{measunit} and t.barcode=#{barcode} and t.description=#{description} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.updateuserid=#{updateuserid} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime} and t.sequno=#{sequno} and ( goodsname LIKE CONCAT(#{goodsname}))

select count(*) from c_goods t where 1=1 and t.goodsid=#{goodsid} and t.goodsid!=#{NoId} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.goodstypeid=#{goodstypeid} and t.goodscode=#{goodscode} and t.goodsname=#{goodsname} and t.goodsspec=#{goodsspec} and t.measunit=#{measunit} and t.barcode=#{barcode} and t.description=#{description} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.updateuserid=#{updateuserid} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime} and t.sequno=#{sequno}
select count(*) from c_goodstype WHERE 1=1 and goodstypename=#{goodsname} and goodstypeid!=#{goodsid} and graindepotid =#{graindepotid}
